enb_long_title: Seventh Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Delegates ended the first week of COP-7 in a flurry of activity and intensive negotiations Saturday.

The extended Bureau meeting held on Saturday night to review progress and decide on next steps was apparently an upbeat and generally positive affair, although at least one speaker reportedly urged that the goodwill seen in the Bureau needed to make its presence more apparent when negotiating and drafting groups resume on Monday.
